name: devon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= an area with its own local government) in southwestern England: He was born in Plymouth, Devon. Lundy Island is located off the north Devon coast.
More examplesFewer examplesGrowing up on a farm in Devon, my brothers and I were used to handling animals.Within a short drive you can reach unspoilt Cornish and Devon countryside.Ford House is situated in an area of Devon known as the South Hams.
